Server

Environment Server

This server simulates the Environment and sends date, time and weather pattern to the client.


Date and Time

Used to determine:

  • Day/night cycle
  • Positions of the stars/planets
  • Seasons


Weather pattern

The weather patterns are divided in zones over the world and based on the entity's location it can decide where he is at and send the corresponding weather pattern.

  • Rain density
  • Snow density
  • Fog density
  • Wind direction/intensity
  • Cloud density/kind

Client

Environment Manager

All effects are local, meaning stars, satellites and sun have different projected locations on the sky at different locations in the world. Aswell as weather, it can rain in one location and be dry with few clouds in another.

Sky Manager

Sun

Controls the sun movement and sky color.

Satellites, Planets & Stars

Controls the movement of solar objects.

The movement of the satellites, planets and stars has been implemented in a plugin object called solarsys. All settings can be changed in the trunk/art/world/world file. The Environment Manager only has to pass the current time to the solarsys plugin.


Nebula

Controls the location of nebula in the sky.

Atmosphere

Controls the atmospheric haze.


Weather Manager

Rain

Displays and controls rainfall, setting up particle effects and materials/renderpasses.

Snow

Displays and controls snowfall, setting up particle effects and materials/renderpasses.

Fog

Displays and controls fog density, setting up materials/renderpasses.

Wind

Controls wind direction and intensity, setting up materials/renderpasses for affected meshes.

Clouds

Controls cloud density, moving direction(based on wind), cloud color and light scattering.

Seasons

Displays and controls seasons, setting up materials/renderpasses. Changing certain foliage, leaf colors or completly remove them.
